Title: Illusion Beaded Top Evening Gown

----

Sku: ML6541

----

Price:

Bulkdiscount: 0

Sizes: 4, 10, 14, 12, 8, 6

Colors: navy

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: ML6541-navy-illusion-beaded-top-evening-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: The scalloped lace bodice is appliqued and outlined with pearl rhinestones. The deep plunging neckline is inlayed with a sheer fabric. The same sheer fabric highlights the back of the bodice where it is trimmed with the same lace applique. The form fitting skirt falls into a sweeping train.
